title: Climate at one minute to midnight, says Johnson
content: As world leaders gather for COP26 in Glasgow, Prime Minister Boris Johnson says action is needed.

title: Climate at one minute to midnight, says Johnson
content: As world leaders gather for COP26 in Glasgow, Prime Minister Boris Johnson says action is needed.

title: UK and EU's row over Northern Ireland escalates
content: Brussels is "increasingly concerned" the UK is embarking on "a path of confrontation" following Brexit.

title: UK and France blame each other over fishing row
content: Johnson says Macron should "de-escalate the rhetoric" and Macron says the "ball is in Britain's court".

title: Toughen up rules on ministers' conduct - watchdog
content: The Committee on Standards in Public Life says transparency on politicians' behaviour is poor.

title: Political editor
content: The COP26 president has been addressing delegates on day one of the climate summit in Glasgow.
